title: Chapter 939 - A Thousand Romantic Sentiments, Ten Thousand Gentle Charms
body:
Chapter 939 - A Thousand Romantic Sentiments, Ten Thousand Gentle Charms

Snowy Skies City.

Inside an inn.

It was already late at night. Su Yi lay in bed and relaxed completely.

His expedition into the City of the Wrongfully Dead wasn’t overly eventful, but his harvest was quite considerable.

He paid particular attention to everything he’d learned about the Nine Heavens Pavilion.

This mysterious faction consisted of numerous ranks: Heavenly Libationers, Wardens, Executioners, and Chosen Apostles. Their location was mysterious.

According to the Executioner Mo Chuan, the Nine Heavens Pavilion’s central divine artifact was a mysterious and unfathomable Dao Sword, and the strongest power at their disposal was the Laws of Heavenly Prayer.

Su Yi naturally attached particular importance to this.

Because his Sword of the Nine Hells could counter the Laws of Heavenly Prayer!

“The leader of the Nine Heavens Pavilion has been searching for someone capable of countering the Laws of Heavenly Prayer. Does that mean he knows the origins of the Sword of the Nine Hells?” Su Yi’s eyes flashed.

The Sword of the Nine Hells hadn’t appeared out of nowhere.

In his past life, when he first stepped onto the path of cultivation...
original_title: Chapter 939 - A Thousand Romantic Sentiments, Ten Thousand Gentle Charms
